item.title: Sweden Selects Tarik Saleh’s ‘Eagles of the Republic’ as Oscar Submission
item.description: Tarik Saleh’s political thriller “Eagles of the Republic” has been selected as Sweden’s entry in the best international feature film category of the Academy Awards. The film, the final installment in
